1.Description: Samsung is a global leader in consumer electronics and mobile technology, offering top-tier smartphones with advanced features like a high-quality camera, a beautiful display, and long-lasting battery life.
1.Models: Samsung Galaxy S23, Samsung Galaxy Note 20, Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4

2.Description: Apple is a premium smartphone maker, known for its high build quality, excellent camera, and smooth iOS ecosystem. A top choice for users who prioritize user experience.

3.Description: Google is known for providing a pure Android experience with fast updates and exceptional camera performance. It is perfect for Android enthusiasts.
3.Models: Google Pixel 8, Google Pixel 7, Google Pixel 6

4.Description: OnePlus offers flagship-level performance at a more affordable price, with a fast, smooth Oxygen OS experience and great hardware.

5.Description: Huawei is a leading global provider of information and communications technology (ICT) infrastructure and smart devices, known for its innovative and powerful smartphones.
5.Models: Huawei P50 Pro, Huawei Mate 40 Pro,Huawei Nova 10

6.Description: Xiaomi is a Chinese multinational electronics company known for producing high-quality smartphones at competitive prices, alongside a wide range of other tech products.
6.Models: Xiaomi Mi 13, Xiaomi Redmi Note 12, Xiaomi Mi Mix Fold
